summary: During the Revolutionary War, American Major John Boulton feigns desertion in order to uncover a British plot to seize the stronghold of West Point.
cast: Cornel Wilde|Michael Wilding|George Sanders|Anne Francis|Robert Douglas|John McIntire|Rhys Williams|John Dehner|James Westerfield|Ashley Cowan|Paul Cavanagh|John Alderson|John O'Malley|Bobby Driscoll|Peter Adams|Don Anderson|Wilson Benge|John Blackburn|George Blagoi|John Bose|Chet Brandenburg|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Tristram Coffin|Phyllis Coghlan|Dee Cooper|Tom Cound|Anthony Dearden|Jack Deery|Leslie Denison|Jimmy Dime|Robert Dix|Byron Foulger|Michael Fox|Paul Frees|Ronald Green|Dabbs Greer|Chick Hannan|Don C. Harvey|Steve Hayes|Jim Hayward|Wes Hudman|Robin Hughes|Olaf Hytten|Charles Keane|Dennis King Jr.|Guy Kingsford|Ann Kunde|Ethan Laidlaw|Bruce Lester|Jon Locke|Keith McConnell|Owen McGiveney|Frank Mills|Charles Morton|Tim Nelson|William H. O'Brien|Vesey O'Davoren|Manuel París|Richard Peel|George Peters|Jennifer Raine|Barry Regan|Vernon Rich|Gordon Richards|Victor Romito|Phil Schumacher|Scott Seaton|Sammy Shack|Clint Sharp|Dick Simmons|Robert Stevenson|Gilchrist Stuart|Rick Vallin|Harlan Warde|Charles Watts|Charlie Watts|Rush Williams
title: Duelo de espías
